page.title: 19BLAGDON TRAFFIC SURVEY 1985
page.content:
On Monday 22nd of July 1985 Class 1 conducted a traffic survey from 9:00 am until 3:30 pm. We got the idea from a similar survey done in October 1978. *********************************** CARS VANS LORRIES MOTORBIKES/ 1403 197 137 BIKES 23 *********************************** BUS/COACH TAXI MOTOR CARAVANS 20 6 HOMES 11 3 *********************************** TRAILERS TRACTORS ARMY HORSES 8 3 TRANSPORT 3 1 *************************************
In the 1978 survey, which was conducted over 8\ hours TOTAL more than us they had 947 more. 1815
